<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:map_decorations}}: Contains key-value pairs of the icons to display on this [[filled map]].
*** {{nbt|compound|''<key>''}}: The key-value pair of a single icon, where the key is an arbitrary unique string identifying the decoration.
**** {{nbt|string|type}}: The type of the icon. Can be {{cd|d=or|player|frame|red_marker|blue_marker|target_x|target_point|player_off_map|player_off_limits|mansion|monument|banner_white|banner_orange|banner_magenta|banner_light_blue|banner_yellow|banner_lime|banner_pink|banner_gray|banner_light_gray|banner_cyan|banner_purple|banner_blue|banner_brown|banner_green|banner_red|banner_black|red_x|village_desert|village_plains|village_savanna|village_snowy|village_taiga|jungle_temple|swamp_hut}}.
**** {{nbt|double|x}}: The X world coordinate of the decoration.
**** {{nbt|double|z}}: The Z world coordinate of the decoration.
**** {{nbt|float|rotation}}: The rotation of the icon, ranging from 0.0 to 360.0, rotated clockwise from north in degrees.<!--
--></onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
